full_description:
Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+CX 3KVA Online UPS

The Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+CX 3KVA Online UPS is a powerful and dependable uninterruptible power supply (UPS) designed to protect important equipment from power outages. It is compatible with a wide range of power sources due to its flexible input arrangement, which supports 1 phase L-N + PE and accommodates a large nominal voltage range of 200V to 240V AC. Even when operating at maximum load, the Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+CX 3KVA Online UPS maintains an excellent power factor performance of >=0.99 at nominal voltage. With its maintenance-free lead-acid batteries, it offers ten to fifteen minutes of backup time at actual load, ensuring continuity even in the event of a power outage. With a power factor of 0.8 and an output capacity of 3000VA/2400W, connected equipment is supplied with steady and dependable power. Clean and reliable power delivery to sensitive loads is ensured by low harmonic distortion of less than 3% THD and voltage control within 1%. Its IP20 protection and small size (397x145x333 mm) allow it to be used in a variety of deployment settings. Easy monitoring and management are further made possible by the Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+CX 3KVA Online UPS's smooth communication capabilities via USB and RS232 ports. It offers complete protection and administration choices for critical infrastructure with features like Emergency Power Off (EPO) mode and compatibility with monitoring software like SNMP and UPSilon 2000.

full_description:
Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 6KVA Online UPS

The Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 6KVA Online UPS is a high-performance uninterruptible power supply (UPS) designed to provide continuous power to essential systems. It provides versatility and dependability in a variety of power situations, operating on a single-phase, three-wire system with a broad input voltage range of 120Vac to 288Vac and an input frequency range of 45Hz to 65Hz. It improves energy efficiency by achieving a high input power factor of >=0.99 for single-phase and >0.95 for three-phase through the use of an IGBT rectifier. The Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 6KVA Online UPS protects connected equipment from power outages by providing clean, uninterrupted power through the use of online double conversion conversion. With accurate voltage and frequency regulation, the system ensures a constant and dependable power production, with a rated power of 6kVA/4.8KW. With a 90% recharge time of more than 6 hours and a lead-acid maintenance-free battery system made up of Leoch batteries, it provides a strong backup power capacity. Comprehensive communication and administration options, such as SNMP card compatibility and a USB/intelligent slot interface, are available with the Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 6KVA Online UPS. Reliable performance in a variety of situations is ensured by its tower installation method, IP20 protection level, and compliance with safety and electromagnetic capability standards. It offers complete protection for connected equipment with overload and surge protection features, as well as surge protection that complies with IEC/EN61000-4.5 standards.

full_description:
Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 10KVA Online UPS

The Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 10KVA Online UPS is a powerful and dependable option for providing continuous power to essential systems. With a broad input voltage range of 305 VAC to 478 VAC and a three-phase 400 VAC system, it provides strong protection against power fluctuations. It protects connected equipment from power outages by providing clean, reliable power through the use of an IGBT rectifier and online double conversion technology. With accurate voltage and frequency regulation and a 10kVA/8KW rated power, the UPS guarantees a stable and dependable power output. With a lead-acid maintenance-free battery system made up of Leoch or comparable batteries, the Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 10KVA Online UPS can provide extended backup power and can charge 90% of its battery life in less than 6 hours. The system has many administration and communication options, including a clever slot interface and USB compatibility. Reliable performance in a variety of situations is ensured by its tower installation method, IP20 protection level, and compliance with safety and electromagnetic capability standards. With overload and surge protection capabilities that satisfy IEC/EN61000-4.5 requirements, the Vertiv Liebert GXT MT+ 10KVA Online UPS provides complete protection for connected equipment. Additionally, the Online UPS has an LCD display for simple programming and monitoring.
